segments.text: I can’t help but cringe as I see the boy climbing that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His excitement over the cookies distracts him from the real danger he’s in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel an urge to shout and warn him, yet I remain a silent observer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s indifference to the overflowing sink almost makes me laugh; she seems so engrossed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus on that dish is so intense that nothing else appears to matter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waiting for her cookie adds a layer of mischief, cooperating with her brother with such innocence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how all of this could turn into a chaotic moment in an instant.
segments.speaker: PAR
